content.prompt: The print above suggests that as nineteenth-century Japan industrialized, Japanese women did which of the following?

choices.label: Stayed at home, out of the workforce.
Demonstrated against participation in the factory system.
Became involved in the factory system and industrial production.
Enjoyed leadership positions over their male counterparts in factories and industries.
Chose to continue the domestic, or cottage, system of production.

topic.text: 5.4: Industrialization Spreads in the Period from 1750 to 1900

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
